review: I have a Roku 3 on my main TV for streaming my PLEX server to and it is great, but I was tired of putting an HDMI cable into my bedroom TV from my desktop in order to watch movies on their without getting blocked. I started using my Chromecast and my life was so much simpler! I had some trouble setting it up, but that was a network issue on my end.

review: I purchased this from Best Buy along with a Smart TV. I was told this product would stream content from the PC (locally stored) to the TV. Being a Smart TV I can already stream from the internet directly. It appears this unit serves no purpose for me and I was lied to by the salesperson. Unless someone can enlighten me to the contrary I can not stream local content. For me a waste of money.
